column1: The Westron mode for Tengwar, or Numenian Mode Chart (http://www.forodrim.org/daeron/mdtci.html#DTS52 DTS52) is a Westron mode for Tengwar devised by J.R.R. Tolkien, first published in Jim Allans Report from Marquette.
The following Westron names are given:
* Report from Marquette by Jim Allan
